title: I Want to Play It
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Just like that, Rina-chan, you can play it now<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah…. But…. it’s hard<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s okay. Look, you already remember which keys to hold down with your right hand, after that is to just not rush and focus on the sound. The piano makes such a lovely sound, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I like the way…. it resonates with my body<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, me too. Since you seem good on the right-hand part, next is the left-hand part. The left-hand part is easy. You just need to alternately hold here and here down<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Uu…. Uuuu~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You can do it….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s hard…. It’s really hard to…. move your left and right hand separately…. But…. I want to play this song<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Then, I’ll do the left-hand part, so should we play through it once? I’ll leave the right-hand part to you, Rina-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yes! I’m happy to play with you, Riko-san…. So…. I’ll do my best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
